item.title: MySql/MariaDb command line cheatsheet
item.description: Commands Connect mysql [-h 192.168.1.100] -u USER_NAME -p [DATABASE_NAME] Will be prompted for password Once connected, the commanda need to end with ;. Common commands ´´´ show tables; ´´´ Exit Ctrl+C
